custom.name: custom-report-sale-today
custom.title: Today Sales
custom.dataset: select sum(totalPrice) as total,count(Id) as total_qty from Order where orderDate = current_date
custom.template:
{{first.total}}

Total Incomes
Total Order: {{first.total_qty}}

custom.name: custom-report-sale-month
custom.title: Monthly Sales
custom.dataset: SELECT sum(total_price) as total,count(id) as total_qty from sale_order where order_date <= date_trunc('month',CURRENT_DATE) + interval '1 month - 1 day'

custom.name: custom-report-sale-year
custom.title: Yearly Sales
custom.dataset: SELECT sum(total_price) as total,count(id) as total_qty from sale_order where order_date <= date_trunc('month',CURRENT_DATE) + interval '1 month - 1 day'
